tool_description: Get questions to ask oneself in an attempt to invoke feelings of gratitude
name: Gratitude Questions
title: Gratitude Questions

api_list.name: Random question
api_list.description: Get a random question designed to invoke feelings of gratitude
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://gratitude-questions.p.rapidapi.com/question"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "gratitude-questions.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://gratitude-questions.p.rapidapi.com/question"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "gratitude-questions.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
